title: Aight enough is enough.
body:
This fucking game is only about adcs and support.

Even in 3versus fuckin 3 YES THAT DEAD GAME MODE that people for years play only Bruisers/Tanks and a mage bot is infested by this shitty adc champs aswell now.
 
From playing farm the bruiser to playing protect the FAckDC. Screw you already you made every gamemode unfun with this shitty meta.

You no longer have the choise to escape getting mousebutton 2'd to death by this skilless pile of garbage role.
Thank you for making the game unplayable.


Edit: To monkey boys fighting about servers. BOTH YOUR SERVERS ARE IRRELEVANT THATS WHY THEY GET SHIT ON BY KR/CN thank you.

replies.body: Holy fucking shit, some people still believe that eu>na and na>eu is still a thing? LMFAO. Its as simple as it can be. Both eu and na are toxic, and we are both bad. Deal with it. Ffs
I'm just killing time before school, always fun bring back the old memefest

> [{quoted}](name=XDaelin1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EauAZZQF,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:50:41.902+0000)
>
> I'm just killing time before school, always fun bring back the old memefest

Lmao same xd
EU LUL. In NA we have learned how to kill adcs. Besides the point a new patch released tonight. So while you are busy BabyRaging. I am gonna keep on climbing that ladder.{{champion:29}}
eu > na tho hehe

FNC Luuuuuuuuul.
MSF Luuuuuuuul. Yea they beat TSM, but TSM loses to team liquid once a split too.
G2 LUUUUUUUUUL!!!!!!!!!!!! {{champion:13}} {{champion:268}} 
I appreciate the banter though <3
But may I ask what region Bjergsen is from? {{sticker:garen-swing}}

What region someone is from isn't actually relevant after a split or two. At this point he got all of his current skill in the NA ecosystem (and maybe some in KR when they practice there), not EU.

This is why KR imports often end up often being worse than native NA pros on top teams after a split or two.

euw still > na tho hehe
https://www.unrankedsmurfs.com/blog/how-many-lol-players-are-on-each-server almost double the players (or more.. idk how accurate) = ~top 5% are gonna be better

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EauAZZQF,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:46:59.897+0000)
>
> euw still > na tho hehe
> https://www.unrankedsmurfs.com/blog/how-many-lol-players-are-on-each-server almost double the players = ~top 5% are gonna be better

No. There are more factors than playerbase size in what makes a server better like the competitive seen (amount of pros and how good they are at practicing) which carries over into solo queue.

Truth is by that logic BR/EUNE should be very close to NA in skill level for solo queue but they're not. A low diamond player on NA can hit master+ on either of those servers.

When I've played on EUW from California I've still been able to play at about the same rank with 180 ping previously.

I mean theres also a lot of videos of pros saying euw soloq > na. 

also http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=c9%20moe# , NA challenger playing his main on EU,  proves everything lel

> [{quoted}](name=Penns,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EauAZZQF,comment-id=00000000000000000001000000010000,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:53:40.890+0000)
>
> I mean theres also a lot of videos of pros saying euw soloq > na. 
> 
> also http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=c9%20moe# , NA challenger playing his main on EU,  proves everything lel

A decayed account without many games (playing with +70 ping) proves everything?

I like how this thread went from adcs opieop to euw vs na lul

In terms of soloq, kr > euw > na tho
How dareth you place EUW > NA when P1 went 4-2 at RR, and EU is currently struggling in groups even in ez brackets
That is an otp Yas player, whom doesn't play on that account often. It decays overtime when u don't play on it a lot. Find more relevant and current stats.
Rift Rivals

Considering how long he's been in NA, i don't think yall can actually claim him anymore.

He's was in EU for like 2 years if that. 4 years in NA and continuing further.

He's not an EU player anymore lad.

Bjerg has spent over half his career in NA though. :Thinking: 
Besides, the only relevant EU players came to NA before they were good, and they became Great, as a result of NA being = KR. KAPPA
Trash talk when you are not gold for 600 games with negative MMR mr.NA.

My boy, if you are using op.gg the API for that is so inaccurate its unbelieveable, I had plat 3 mmr not even two days ago and it was saying i had 1,540 mmr, which is lower then the avg for gold, and it still gave me the plat portrait. <3

Oh cause plat or diamond is any better *myboy*? Considering you abuse Tw as you mentioned not beeing at least d2 is a disgrace.Garbage players LUL what would you expect from a community where as low as plat is top 9%
Why are you talking when the best you ever got was Plat 5?
The acc is banned Dip--- no shit it went inactive since it got banned last year during August.
Then why do u care about current meta if u dont play.
I still play on various accounts but they are not mine.  And riot doesnt *promote account sharing* LUL
Interesting. So your opinion has been made irrelevant because the only accounts you are like to borrow are low silver as people tend to keep their higher up smurfs to themselves.

lul any silver acc i got my hands on this year is already diamond. I'd list em but rather not get them banned. I could list one tho that is banned anyway Arcaadian. Good ol j4 days. Also yeh i've mained kha and people have heard about me playing kha around so you cant say i brought a random acc. 

http://eune.op.gg/summoner/userName=Arcaadian

See, there is no for sure way to say this was your account, I can also look up, and or link past accounts of friends, and or current players. Regardless, I can't help but notice that u said it was banned, and something or another it was mentioned ur highest elo was p5, so was it banned for getting boosted to dia? I think thats a likely story.
All my accs in EUNE are banned for toxicity. And the EUW accs for inting during late season 6. i Remember every single ban i've had.

I've only played this game for two years, i'd say plat is a fair achievement since many people remain silver and bronze most of their lives. Regardless, if u wanna pull the rank card, my elo is higher then u are now and were last year.

1. i wasn't even talking to you, hence why it wasn't replied to you.
2. i only play ranked enough to get border or when someone ask me. hence when my match history goes weeks without ranked games.

Take that "im constantly improving" argument with someone who regularly plays the game smart one.
My apologies mate, I am not well learned in how to use a boards im just simply here to kill time

wait, i don't abuse twitch I have 21 games on him this season? Kappa.
What is this EU Logic?
However, at some point we have to come to an agreement on when elo matters. I agree plat doesn't matter either, but I am still above 70% of the community in terms of elo, it is also likely i hit plat this season and continue to climb next season as I was gold my first season ( last season) and i am now almost plat, so I am showing a steady increase in skill. Whereas your account doesnt appear to be your boards name so what are you my friend?
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/247827285498003456/367619960647712769/1507282058017.png

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EauAZZQF,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-10-11T10:27:26.564+0000)
>
> Trash talk when you are not gold for 600 games with negative MMR mr.NA.

Ill have you know I have +35 wins and used to main adc urgot before their rework 😤😤😤

What is "negative MMR" ?
This thread went from "holy shit adc and support so broken!! fix pls riot" to "na better than eu or eu better than na because of this and this" What a shit show.
they mad cause they get shit on by KR every year mate LOL

I feel you dude. I been playing 3v3 on my alts almost exclusively to escape this protect the adc bullshit. Seeing them go into my jungle, take the jungle farm + lane farm while their stupid little {{champion:44}} follows them around is disgusting. Fortunately if you ban out {{champion:44}} there isn't a support that can reliably protect the adc.

What the fuck are these comments?
Twitch chat with the EU>NA NA>EU shit?
This is me killing time before class.

Typical peE yoU player not wanting the most demanding role in the game to not reign supreme.

OP is probably a bruiser main.

DEMANDING -RIGHTCLICKING PEOPLE TO DEATH .

You probably think Riven is broken too and cry when you get your balls chopped off in SQ by Riven OTP's that's what most NA player have been doing if you wanna bring servers into it damn.
They only do that in low elos. Riven is irrelevant after diamond
I see it on YT in LCS highlights how adcs stand still and shit on everything in sight. Please. get lost.
